designation: Senior IT Manager & Paid Search Specialist

I provided first and second-line IT support for UK offices and remote users, and collaborated closely with clients' web developer teams to implement conversion rate optimisation strategies.
description2: Additionally, I managed Google Ads and Bing Ads accounts, overseeing a monthly click spend exceeding Â£100k for clients.

description1: After being promoted, my role expanded to include responsibilities as an IT Manager, overseeing critical systems and providing first and second-line IT support across the organisation which I undertook in tandem with Paid Search Account Manager.
I joined Ocere in a technical role supporting the account manager team to help devise and execute effective SEO & PPC strategies for our clients.
description2: My responsibilities were later expanded to implement and troubleshoot tracking code on behalf of our clients, and helping out withing the IT support team.

description1: This three-year undergraduate course centred on game design and programming, with LAN and WANs networking fundamentals, providing a comprehensive range of skills.
description2: Subjects covered include:  Cisco networking fundamentals, rapid software prototyping, user interface design, advanced game engines and physics, and game production & testing.

designation: BTEC National Diploma for IT Practitioners
description1: My national diploma encompassed a wide spectrum of IT disciplines over two years of study.
description2: Subjects covered include: software development, database management systems, website development, computer hardware assembly & troubleshooting, and computational methods.
